name: black-candy
description: BlackCandy is a self-hosted music streaming server that works with your personal music library. It provides multi-user support, playlist management, and a friendly web UI, making it a lightweight music streaming alternative.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create accounts for family and friends. Share your library

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Create and organize playlists across devices. Curate your music

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, responsive UI works on all devices. Beautiful player

features.title: Library Organization
features.description: Automatic organization by artist, album, and genre. Smart cataloging

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find songs, albums, and artists instantly. Quick discovery

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage for efficient streaming. Fast performance

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your music collection. Privacy guaranteed
